emuInput.TitMainTitle: Teacher J. T. Strother pointing to painted Pittsburgh scenery made by students, kneeling: Jesse Wilkes, Paul Whitley, Ernie Boyden, David Barrett; standing: Clarence Garett, Oliver Rayzer, Robert Williams and Reginald Fincher for graduation in Herron Hill Junior High School
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 2, 1957, pg. 13, reads: "'Pittsburgh Renaissance' - This was the theme for the graduation exercises at Herron Hill Junior High School. The boys, who were responsible for making the scenery, under the direction of their teacher, J. T. Strother at the right, are kneeling: Jesse Wilkes, Paul Whitley, Ernie Boyden and David Barrett. Standing: Clarence Garett, Oliver Rayzer, Robert Williams and Reginald Fincher. - Harris Photo."
